channel.title: Rke2 on Kubermates
channel.description: Recent content in Rke2 on Kubermates

item.title: v1.33.4+rke2r1
item.description: This release updates Kubernetes to v1. 33. 4. Important Note If your server (control-plane) nodes were not started with the –token CLI flag or config file key, a randomized token was generated during initial cluster startup. This key is used both for joining new nodes to the cluster, and for encrypting cluster bootstrap data within the datastore. Ensure that you retain a copy of this token, as is required when restoring from backup. You may retrieve the token value from any server already joined to the cluster: As always, we welcome and appreciate feedback from our community of users. Please feel free to: There was an error while loading. Please reload this page. There was an error while loading. Please reload this page.
